6 Preprocessing::Preprocessing(ros::NodeHandle* node, Cloud* cloud)
7 {
8  this->name = cloud->name;
9  this->frame = cloud->frame;
10  this->frame_pub = cloud->frame_pub;
11  string topic = "/calib/clouds/" + this->name;
12  this->node = node;
13  this->tf_listener = new tf::TransformListener;
14  this->frame = cloud->frame;
15  this->frame_pub = cloud->frame_pub;
16  this->sub = this->node->subscribe(topic, 1, &Preprocessing::update, this);
17  this->pub_preproc = this->node->advertise<pc_t>(topic + "/preproc", 1);
18 }

20 /*
21 * @brief Dynamic reconfiguer callback.
22 */
23 void Preprocessing::conf_callback(calib::PreprocessingConfig &config, uint32_t level)
24 {
25  this->frame = config.frame;
26  // subsampling
27  this->param_voxel.enable = config.enable;
28  this->param_voxel.x = config.size / 1000;
29  this->param_voxel.y = config.size / 1000;
30  this->param_voxel.z = config.size / 1000;
31  // cutting
32  this->param_cut.x.enable = config.x_enable;
33  this->param_cut.x.bounds[0] = config.x_min / 1000;
34  this->param_cut.x.bounds[1] = config.x_max / 1000;
35  this->param_cut.y.enable = config.y_enable;
36  this->param_cut.y.bounds[0] = config.y_min / 1000;
37  this->param_cut.y.bounds[1] = config.y_max / 1000;
38  this->param_cut.z.enable = config.z_enable;
39  this->param_cut.z.bounds[0] = config.z_min / 1000;
40  this->param_cut.z.bounds[1] = config.z_max / 1000;
41 }

45  * @brief Publish point cloud.
46  *
47  * @param pub Ros message publisher.
48  * @param cloud Point cloud.
49  */
50  void Preprocessing::publish(ros::Publisher& pub, pc_t& cloud)
51  {
52  pc_msg_t msg;
53  pcl::toROSMsg(cloud, msg);
54  this->publish(pub, msg);
55  }

69  /*
70  * @brief Publish point cloud.
71  *
72  * @param pub Ros message publisher.
73  * @param input Point cloud pointer.
74  */
75  void Preprocessing::publish(ros::Publisher& pub, const pc_msg_t& input)
76  {
77  pc_msg_t msg = input;
78  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(this->frame_pub, msg, msg, *this->tf_listener);
79 
80  if (msg.data.size() > 0)
81  {
82  pub.publish(msg);
83  }
84  }

86 /*
87  * @brief Apply a voxel filter to the point cloud.
88  *
89  * @param input Input cloud.
90  * @param params Filter parameters.
91  */
92 pcPtr Preprocessing::subsample(const pcPtr& input, param_voxel_t params)
93 {
94  if (params.enable && input->points.size() > 0)
95  {
96  this->filter_voxel.setInputCloud(input);
97  this->filter_voxel.setLeafSize(params.x, params.y, params.z);
98  pc_t* cloud = new pc_t;
99  this->filter_voxel.filter(*cloud);
100  pcPtr output(cloud);
101  if (output->points.size() > 0)
102  {
103  return output;
104  }
105  else
106  {
107  return input;
108  }
109  }
110  else
111  {
112  return input;
113  }
114 }
115 
122 pcPtr Preprocessing::cut(pcPtr input, param_cut_t params)
123 {
124  ROS_DEBUG("Cutting point cloud...");
125  if (params.x.enable || params.y.enable || params.z.enable)
126  {
127  ROS_DEBUG("Cutting request found.");
128  pcPtr temp(new pc_t(*input));
129  pcPtr filtered(new pc_t);
130  if (params.x.enable)
131  {
132  ROS_DEBUG("Cutting in X.");
133  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
134  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("x");
135  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.x.bounds[0], params.x.bounds[1]);
136  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
137  temp = filtered;
138  }
139  if (params.y.enable)
140  {
141  ROS_DEBUG("Cutting in Y.");
142  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
143  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("y");
144  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.y.bounds[0], params.y.bounds[1]);
145  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
146  temp = filtered;
147  }
148  if (params.z.enable)
149  {
150  ROS_DEBUG("Cutting in Z.");
151  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
152  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("z");
153  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.z.bounds[0], params.z.bounds[1]);
154  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
155  temp = filtered;
156  }
157  if (temp->points.size() > 0)
158  {
159  return temp;
160  }
161  else
162  {
163  ROS_WARN("Point cloud empty after cutting, cancelling...");
164  return input;
165  }
166  }
167  else
168  {
169  ROS_DEBUG("No cutting request detected.");
170  return input;
171  }
172 }
173 
174 /*
175 * @brief Subscriber callback containing processing loop
176 */
177 void Preprocessing::update(const pcConstPtr& input)
178 {
179  pc_t* cloud(new pc_t(*input));
180  pcPtr cloudPtr(cloud);
181  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(this->frame, *cloud, *cloud, *this->tf_listener);
182  cloudPtr = this->cut(cloudPtr, this->param_cut);
183  cloudPtr = this->subsample(cloudPtr, this->param_voxel);
184  this->publish(this->pub_preproc, cloudPtr);
185 }
